summary:
✨INTRODUCING MY NEWEST MHA OC.. FUKAI!!✨
she’s uhh my 5th? She’s just the one I finished recently-! Don’t worry everyone you’ll...
body:
✨INTRODUCING MY NEWEST MHA OC.. FUKAI!!✨

she’s uhh my 5th? She’s just the one I finished recently-! Don’t worry everyone you’ll get to meet the others soon! She’s a tall, (about 6’1) rude (to select people) and strong. Her quirk is that she can turn any part of her body into a big mouth that can bite through almost any surface. Though the mouth on her face is the only mouth that is permanent and can eat/drink and talk. She also is Jiros girlfriend because it’s 2019 I do oc x canon if I please ┐(￣ヮ￣)┌

blog.name: ellusquirk
blog.title: hi i'm ellie
blog.description: bnha, sds, khnm, opm | wattpad: elluspaghettu | requests: closed

summary: Hello! Can I get a male mashup? I have pretty long and super curly dark brown hair, light hazel eyes, tan skin, dimples, a scar...
question: Hello! Can I get a male mashup? I have pretty long and super curly dark brown hair, light hazel eyes, tan skin, dimples, a scar on my right cheek, have a birthmark on my left thigh, and I’m 5’1. I am also a Dancer, Cheerleader, and I’m in Color/Winter Guard. I have Anxiety and often have Anxiety attacks. But other than that I am Ambiverts (I have extrovert and introvert tendencies). I love both savory and sweet food and I have a pug named Ellie!
answer:
say hello to pug ellie for me uwu. that’s my name! also i had to look up color/winter guard so i’m sorry if its inaccurate.

✎ Eijirou Kirishima

  • eijirou’s the one for you!
  • eijirou’s a sucker for dimples. he thinks they’re so so cute and he’ll try to make you smile at any opportunity he gets so he can see them. every single time he sees you smile he loves to squish your cheeks or just stare at your dimples. he loves them so so much and he would do anything so he could see you smile for him dimples.
  • he loves the fact that you have a scar on his cheek. if you ever feel self conscious about your birthmark or your scar he’ll tell you just how beautiful you are and won’t ever let you say a bad word about them. every time you do he makes sure to remind you how gorgeous they are and how they make you who you are.
  • he’s definitely your biggest supporter when it comes to your dancing. he’ll help you practice, but it the end it will probably just end up being the two of you mucking around and not really practicing any routines. but the two of you have lots and lots of fun together.
  • he thinks it’s super cool that you’re a cheerleader, but gets pissed whenever kaminari and mineta start perving around - you’ll never have to worry about them though. he has a mini heart attack whenever you those jumps or drops, and always holds his breath whenever you do it. he loves that you’re so dedicated to your training and is so so damn proud of you.
  • speaking of being proud, he’s incredibly proud of you for dedicating your time to color/winter guard. he thinks it’s incredibly admirable that you go out of your way to do it and thinks its super cool do. sometimes he asks you to teach him some of the moves, but he’s super clumsy so he isn’t exactly good, but he has lots of fun with you!
  • eijirou’s the best at helping you through your anxiety attacks. he’ll do whatever you want him to, just so he can help you. he always takes time to reassure you that everything’s alright and he won’t leave your side if you don’t want him to. he’ll do absolutely everything to make sure that you feel better and will likely spend time learning ways he can help you. he’s always there to support you and won’t leave you alone.
  • he will absolutely spoil you and ellie rotten. she’ll freaking love him and he’ll probably be one of her favourite humans. he loves to snuggle with her and will willingly babysit her for you. he’ll help you however he can when it comes to your pug, and she’ll definitely be his baby.

written 29/04/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

title: Heat Up, Cool Down
description:
by LoonyLoomy

In which Uraraka and Deku double-team Bakugou.

[Sequel to Push and Pull, but both are PWPs so they stand alone!]

Series: Part 2 of Good Things Come In Threes

summary: hello!! your blog is so lovely and your icons are so so cute!! you are also cute!!!! look at you being so cute and nice!! is it...
question: hello!! your blog is so lovely and your icons are so so cute!! you are also cute!!!! look at you being so cute and nice!! is it okay if we get some sweet sweet Shigaraki icons with any kind of lil flowers, stars, and rainbows?

summary: Can i get a soulmate au oneshot with Bakugou? reader is an artist who draws on her arm a lot. All the drawings appear on...
question: Can i get a soulmate au oneshot with Bakugou? reader is an artist who draws on her arm a lot. All the drawings appear on bakugou’s arm too and he’s irritated he cant do anything about it.  One day they’re doing training in class and he’s paired up against reader. When the sleeve of her outfit gets burnt/blown off he notices the art thats the same to the stuff on his arm and just stops whatever he was doing to stare.  Thank you!!
answer:
this is so bad i’m sorry :(

doodle || katsuki bakugou

He hated the unpredictability of the drawings.

Yet he loved it at the same time.

The little hearts, flowers and faces that adorned his arm almost daily were incredibly embarrassing, but in his moments alone he couldn’t help but smile as he studied the new doodles, satisfied with the knowledge that you seemed to be alive and well, somewhere in a classroom with a dreamy look on your face as you drew on your arm. He couldn’t help but trace his fingertips over them absentmindedly, his heart fluttering slightly time, skin tingling. He admired your skill, the way you seemed to make anything gorgeous, how you seemed to rectify accidents with a couple swipes of your pen, almost as if it wasn’t there in the first place, only identifiable through intense studying. In a way, he thought of them as his hearts.

But still, it was infuriating that he couldn’t wipe them off, and was forced to rely on you to clean them off, yet you barely seemed to make an effort, allowing them to slowly fade away, not making any particular effort to scrub them off whilst showering.

“Your Soulmate really does like doodling,” Kirishima commented, sparing a glance at the fresh set of doodles curling around Bakugou’s hand. “At least they’re talented!”

Bakugou grunted as he slammed his locker shut, reaching for his gauntlets and pulling them on roughly, gloves following. “Its damn annoying though.”

A small smile slipped onto Kirishima’s lips, and he shook his head. “Hey, you know they’re alright though don’t you? Some of our Soulmates don’t draw on our arms, so we don’t know whether or not they’re alright.”

Bakugou sighed, throwing his head back, closing his eyes and drawing in a deep breath. “Yeah, I suppose you’re right.” And he was, had you not been a big doodler then Bakugou would worry himself silly about you. He blew out another sigh, eyes snapping open as he pushed himself to his feet, leading Kirishima out of the changing room. “They better start drawing something other than hearts and flowers or I’ll kill them.”

A snort left Kirishima. “Hey, where’s All Might? Isn’t he meant to be here? I thought he was teaching us today.”

“You are right young Kirishima, for I am here!” Kirishima started as All Might suddenly slammed his hands down on his shoulders, before rushing to the front of the class and addressing them with open arms. “Settle down, class, settle down! I know you’re all excited to get started! I thought it would be a good idea to try some sparring today, but not just any sparring! Sparring with people your Quirks are incompatible in! It’ll be a great opportunity for you all to learn the weaknesses of your Quirks.”

The class started to buzz with excitement.

“I’ve already assigned your partners!” the Hero exclaimed, proceeding to read from a list he produced from his back pocket. Bakugou listened patiently, heart skipping a beat when his name was finally announced. “Bakugou and (L/N).”

His eyes snapped over to your form. He knew of you, but didn’t know a lot about you. You sat at the back of the classroom, between Uraraka and Todoroki. You were an average student academically, but your Quirk possessed a hell of a lot of power. Superstrength - a Quirk he definitely wouldn’t have the advantage over if you managed to land a punch. He could dodge you easily, but after a while it would grow tiring and his muscles would start to spasm. Your Quirk was certainly a force to be reckoned with, not one to be underestimated, but if you played your cards right, not one to be feared either.

Bakugou barely paid attention to the sparring, keeping his gaze locked on the back of your head as you watched. He felt his heart squeeze a little bit when you jumped up and down with excitement upon Uraraka’s victory, and he quickly scolded himself afterwards, looking down at his gauntlet - the only barrier between him and his Soulmate’s drawings.

“Bakugou, you’re up next man!”

When Kirishima pushed him forwards, he made a point of turning around and glaring at him, eventually stepping up to the stage and meeting your eyes boldly. He didn’t even hear All Might count down, but he did notice how your eyes seemed to come closer and closer, and when Kirishima shouted his name from the sidelines he finally made his move. His arm reached out instinctively, grasping yours as miniature explosions shot out of it. A shriek left your lips, and when you made a swipe for him he let go, eyes fixed on your now sleeveless arm.

He paused.

Those were his hearts.

written on 29/04/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

blog.name: obito-is-love
blog.title: Obito Is Love
blog.description: An anime blog solely dedicated to my favorite art form! The majority of my posts are queued so that I don't spam the dashboard, as well as screenshots and music from my favorite osts that I've posted here. I like to capture my favorite moments from every episode I watch, hence the multiple screenshots per post. Apologies in advance for my obsessive tendencies! I tend to marathon shows.

blog.name: natsspammityspamspamham
blog.title: Nat's Spammity Spam Spam Ham
blog.description: Check out my main account: nsisbest385. I'm currently shuffling my Tumblrs around for some reason. I do music stuff... yeah. This is my fando(o)m place though. My second one is for top-tier trash, rants, and literary comments. This for the dreams and the memes. Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to tame the Aurora Borealis that's in my kitchen.
